properties.name: app.security.attempts-before-captcha
properties.description: Number of login attempts before require a captcha answer. Default: 3.

properties.name: app.security.captcha.max-length
properties.description: Maximum length of the generated captcha token. Default: 4.

properties.name: app.security.captcha.case-mode
properties.description: Captcha mode for the generated tokens. Available options: uppercase (all chars are uppercase), lowercase (all chars are lowercase), mixed (the characters are mixed, it depends on CaGe configuration). Default: uppercase.
